refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the azimuth and elevation (AE) using the provided direction vector.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Returns the azimuth and elevation (AE) using the provided direction vector as input. If the -i option is used the commmand will return the inverse AE. See also the ae2dir and qvrot commands.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the dir2ae command to get the AE.

example.title: Find the AE using the provided direction vector.
example.para: Returns the AE using a direction vector of 0.707107 0.707107 0.
